Title: Instant new Rails applications with the App Scrolls by Dr Nic
Description:
http://drnicwilliams.com/2012/04/10/instant-new-rails-applications-with-the-app-scrolls/

Install and use App Scrolls:

$ gem install appscrolls                                                          
$ scrolls new mydemoapp -s twitter_bootstrap unicorn mysql resque redis rspec guard
